question: Hey allI really hope you can all help me,  I'm trying to make sense of all my symptoms.  I was diagnosed app 2 years ago with CFS. The doctor listened and looked back at my symptoms then done one blood test (for hyperthyroisism) then told me it was chronic fatigue syndrome.  I have that many different symptoms and i'm not even sure if it is cfs also i don't think my doctor really bothered to investigate it.  I haven't been right for at least 7 years and i'm not sure what to do.  I have no support from my partner or family as they just don't understand how ill i feel at times especially during a flare up!Here's a background of my symptoms :27 yo femalefatiguemalaise - flu like symptomsmyalgia - pain all overmouth ulcersi feel as though i have a temperature but i dontjoint and muscle painbad memorybrain fog3 out of my 7 pregnancies ended in miscarriagemy last pregnancy i had preclampsiawhich also stayed for 4 months after (post preeclampsia) (high blood pressure and uric acid)Sometimes i'm ok i'll still have a sleep during the day but when i have a bad flare up i have all the symptoms in one go and just end up lying on the sofa :(the last 8 weeks i have been consantly sick not only with the above symptoms but i hadpneumonia then i caught  cold and another chest infection, done my back in, then i got another cold and my throat was red raw, and then i had a flare up of my 'normal' problems myalgia etc.  and during all this i had about 7 mouth ulcers everytime i got rid of one i gained another!!!so if any-one has any ideas of what can be wrong please please let me knowk xxxxSorry for the rant but i think you all know what its like to know something is wrong but there is nothing you can do!
